constraint.description: The method call violates the law of demeter (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Law_of_Demeter).
constraint.cypher: MATCH (o:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method)-[i:INVOKES]->(r:Method)<-[:DECLARES]-(c:Class) WHERE not (o = c) and not ((m)-[:CONSTRUCTS]->(c)) and not ((m)-[:HAS]->(:Parameter)-[:OF_TYPE]->(c)) and not ((o)-[:DECLARES]->(:Field:Member)-[:OF_TYPE]->(c)) RETURN m
